title: Superman Classic edit by Taolar
description:
This is the incomplete, but watchable edit I did of Superman: the Motion Picture and Superman II.  With around two hours cut, the result is a tighter, darker, less campy film.  Previously called Superman: Son of Jorel.

More details here: http://originaltrilogy.com/forum/topic.cfm/Superman-by-Taolar-Formally-Son-of-Jorel-WORKPRINT-AVAILABLE/topic/5793/

Standard Definition 2 DVD set.
